snippet.title: Rotate Game Trailer
snippet.description:
Play it for free at: https://firetotemgames.itch.io/rotate-game

=====================================================

A game made by Fire Totem Games.

Rotate your blocks to match the target. Easy to learn, hard to master. Improve your 3D thinking.

Play over 100 levels + randomly generated levels. Can you finish all levels with 3 stars?

Play against the time in endless mode. How long can you make it?

Over 40 different blocks including simple colors, flags, and many more ... Unlock them all!

=====================================================

Learn more about it: https://firetotemgames.itch.io/

Follow me on Twitter: https://twitter.com/FireTotemGames

=====================================================

Credits

Fire Totem Games
  Game Design
  Programming
  2D and 3D Art
  Sound Effects

Music "Return of the Hackers (long loop)" from the ColossalGameMusicCollection on the Unity Asset Store.
